     cars

     almost

3.23.18  4:33 pm   Why did  La de da de da de day oh take 10 years to produce?

     it did not

      (Serious question, I did my research and I know the chorus is from 2008.)

     that's not true, the chorus is from 2012

      Did you just put it off for another time?

     i moved onto the next song in the list. and the next 400 songs after that

      I don't mean to say it's bad lol it's great. I'd guess it was just the development of other songs.

3.23.18  4:11 pm   ever thought of making a video in the horror genre

     no

3.23.18  3:31 pm   how do you decide what to focus your energy on?

     stage a tournament, with an intricate heirarchical bracket system

      how can you avoid being a jack of all trades if you like doing many different things?

     panic first, then set up a tournament

3.23.18  3:25 pm   can you say no

     sure

3.23.18  2:29 pm   Do you enjoy older music? (ex. 50's, 60's etc) I certainly do. (you probably don't care about my answer but whatever.)

     i enjoy music from any time, if i can hear it

3.23.18  1:58 pm   For any kind of art, is it a good idea to study art, or just study yourself? A mixture?

      both. maybe even study how you react to art. and then study art which was made by you. stay tuned for more combinations

      I feel like a lot of art lacks originality, and whenever people tell me to study this or that, I feel a cagey, like I might forget my own way. Did you ever have this problem?

     it's not really a problem. either way you will be just fine

3.23.18  1:44 pm   why do black keys right next to white keys sound terrible when played at the same time?

     they sound fine as long as you play certain other keys as well, for reinforcement

      another question: do you like playing black keys right next to white keys at the same time?

     yes, with proper reinforcement. or, if a tense moment is called for, maybe with no reinforcement

3.23.18  1:25 pm   do you have a job?

     it's a boj

      Does it involve cats?

     no

      it should

     i disagree

3.23.18  12:07 pm   My boyfriend keeps telling me about the news, but it's so terrifying that I can't do things.

     oh that's great news for the news, now you'll watch more

      I feel like I should stay up to date and that it's important, but I would also prefer not to be in a constant state of terror. Advice?

     don't forget, the news puts news on the news even when there is no news. the bad stuff works better because it gets you to watch more. where as the real news you will reach you, even if you don't watch the news. for example if the entire world is on fire, your friend or brother will assuredly tell you

3.23.18  11:59 am   What if I can't?

     ah, that's the spirit

     the answers are posted in the order they were sent

3.23.18  11:25 am   What's your specialty?

     talking to walls

3.23.18  11:04 am   Is life just virtual reality but we just don't know it

     reality is virtual life

     that would be difficult to calculate, due to the multi-faceted and layered nature of the project

     yes but no

     4.4.16  6:12 pm

3.23.18  9:36 am   (my previous submission was a mistake please ignore thanks.)
so far you have expressed art in the first and second dimension.

     and 4th, or 3rd, depending on which order you put the dimensions in

      do you have any interest in going into the third dimension? I imagine... a world built with music being generated before you while the song plays and you can explore it. Maybe we can even get the mountains in there so we can climb those things. How do you feel about this?

     i might do something a little different

     yes but i can't prove it right now

3.22.18  9:05 pm   I lost the packaging, how long do I put it in the microwave for?

     you forgot to tell me what the thing is

3.22.18  8:46 pm   I'm working on a song right now. I wrote it a long time ago (well not so long if we're using geological scale) and never really payed any attention to it, but one time one musician heard it's unfinished version and said that it is a very great song, and a very lame performance. As I am clinically crazy, I started to work on it from the beginning and saw it's "true" potential. It's a song about trying to escape from reality by going, walking far away. Walking home, searching home.

But I can't make it right. Right now it is almost 8 minutes long, and boring for everybody but me.
Kind mister, please advice me. How to make those 8 minutes The Eight Minutes?

     you are probably asking the wrong person. i have a general rule not to make songs longer than 4 minutes. for something longer, i think it needs visual elements, maybe some story telling, many more things outside of just being a song. that's just what i've learned from experience. that doesn't mean you can't make a longer song with audio only, but it's not something i have any advice for. my first advice would make it much more than a song and use visual and story telling elements

     How to make a masterpiece out of something that might touch only my puny schizo hearth? Should I just climb this mountain? There is probably no use in me writing this and I'm still a piece of garbage, but I won't write it so I'm free to do it XD
I just look for some inspiration. ..

By the way I love your work, it helped me through some harder times yesterday, and it always touches my puny hearth deeply :)

3.22.18  8:38 pm   How high can I levitate, before it would be considered flying?

     it's considered floating unless you move horizontally to a new geographical location

     you already did

     a broom
